pages.text: Automobility adds customizable cars to Minecraft, letting you travel in style! $(br2)Build your own car, customize it with different parts, and drive across the world.

Start by crafting a Car Frame using iron and wood. $(br2)Add a Seat, Engine, and Wheels to complete your car. $(br2)Use dye to change the color of your car, and choose from various wheels and engines to improve its performance.
Drive smoothly across any terrain, and even drift around tight corners! $(br2)Upgrade your car with better wheels for off-road driving or a more powerful engine for speed.
